mapper.insert: insert into movieshowing_maoyan (id, name, image, rating, is_imax, is_3d, directors, actors, type, content, runTime, ver) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isImax,jdbcType=BIT}, #{is3d,jdbcType=BIT}, #{directors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{runtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ver,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select id, name, image, rating, is_imax, is_3d, directors, actors, type, content, runTime, ver from movieshowing_maoyan where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
